title: EnableDocumentFunction property to allow document() function for XSLT
body: We need to display XML files, which references a stylesheet (XSL). Therefore a local XSL Transformation has to take place to show files from e.g. the LocalCache folder. One way to do this is to use the XsltProcessor. Currently, document() function is disabled. Therefore it would be nice to have an option like XsltSettings.EnableDocumentFunction Property in .NET apps.
